column4: Hello , i have an issue with playing mp4 format. The issue is that it shows the movie but does not play the audio.. can anyone suggest me the required codec
when i double click on mp4 it opens up in totem. in the properties section the audio area is greyed out
am i missing a codec.. .everything else plays fine
try it with gxine.. solved some of my issues.. or vlc..
give us a link to the video and I'll see if I can play it.
playing inside of FF works for me.. let me download and try with an application
I can't download it from the provided link even with wget.. I'll search for it and try again
works fine here.. mplayer, gxine, vlc ..
I think you're just missing the codecs.
i got a slow internet connection :-) its just 18% now
